Don't be too upset tho, I'm sure we can get together monday! :)"

All in all it was work pretty well and Bonnie was more or less leaving her alone...other than the occasional sinister reminder about the fact that she would be a teacher at Brielle's school come Monday.

         On Sunday night Brielle received a text from Aelish demanding that she Facetime her so that she could help her choose her outfit for school on Monday, as Aelish was still sick and wanted to make sure Brielle had something to remind her of her. Brielle ignored this text for a few minutes hoping it would go away before having that fantasy shattered by the buzzing of her phone, which contained another message from Aelish.          Brielle got up earlier than usual to get dressed up as Aelish demanded not wanting to risk her wrath. Brielle put the finishing touches on her lipstick and looked at herself in the mirror, letting out a groan at what she saw. It wasn't awful, but her signature look that she used to strike fear into the hearts of Jefferson High was just skewed enough to make her feel vulnerable. Her hair and makeup made her look girly, but the real damage was done by the yoga pants. When she turned to the side in the mirror her ass looked huge! Firm and bouncy as she self-consciously grabbed it, but BIG and she could see it jiggle when she made any movements at all! A knock at her door shook her from her paranoid spiral.

"Brielle, we need to get going or we're gonna be late! Come on princess, let's get a move on!" Bonnie called through the door.

Brielle snapped back at her "It's only 7:30 you bimbo! School doesn't start until 9!"

"I need to be there by 8:15. I'm a teacher, Brielle and don't call me a bimbo or I will pull you over my knee for such a spanking!" Bonnie yelled back.

"Fine. Whatever." Brielle huffed "Gp ahead I don't want a ride from you anyways after what you did to me on Friday! You probably just want to wedgie me in the car...or pants me as I get out...orororor."

"Brielle, stop that, you sound a little pathetic" Bonnie said with a slight chuckle "Look I am sorry about all that, you were just so rude to me when you first saw me and then I found out you lied about our fun weekend! I just wanted to share it with your friends. I wish you weren't ashamed of being my sister." Bonnie said this with such sincerity that Brielle actually began to reconsider. "Look, I promise I won't embarrass you during the ride OR once the ride is over. I will drop you off and I'll drop you off before I park in the staff lot, kay?"

"You got it Princess." Brielle said with a resigned tone, trudging out of her room and down the stairs with Bonnie following close behind.

"Classic Brielle." Bonnie said with a shake of her head "By the way love the hair and those pants make your ass look great!" Bonnie reach out and pinched Brielle's ass getting a yelp from Brielle. After getting their shoes and bags together Brielle opened the front door and stepped onto the porch when she heard a whoosh, as she felt a cool breeze on her legs. Looking down in horror at her yoga pants pooled around her ankle with her sister's hand attached to them Brielle squealed.

"Bonnie you promised!" Brielle said with a squeak.

"Ah, ah, ah I promised not to do anything in the car or after." replied Bonnie "This is the punishment for calling me a bimbo and for being a hypocrite. You told me on Friday that you were the princess and you have the panties to prove it," Bonnie snapped Brielle's waistband for emphasis "Yet you still called me a princess, tsk tsk. Now march on down to the car, princess!" Brielle Bent down to pull up her pants, but was met with a harsh slap on the behind from Bonnie.

"Ow, what the fu-" started Brielle.

"Language!" said Bonnie "Keep them at your ankles, that's the punishment."

"Someone might see me! Please no, please!" Pleaded Brielle.

"Only if you keep kicking up a fuss and standing out in the open. It is early, most people aren't out and about, so just hurry up!" Bonnie implored her. Resigned to her fate Brielle began her march of shame with her pants around her ankles and humiliating panties on display. Brielle found herself only able to do an awkward combination of waddling and shuffling, which turned what should have been a 30 second walk to the car into a 2 minute one. "Those are some nice small steps, so lady-like! You really are a princess...I should get you a tiara!" Bonnie mocked, while Brielle seethed. "You know, that Bum of yours really is quite pale, maybe your friend was right about it need some sun." Bonnie continued "That booty also has quite a bit of jiggle to it. I could show you some exercises to keep it under control if you want."

"I never thought of you as the selfie type, I love the outfit by the way!" Brielle looked up sharply from her phone and found the voice belonged to none other than Brook. Brook was one of her favorite wedgie targets. Brook had arrived at Jefferson and wowed everyone with her good looks, but Brielle only had eyes for her undies, which she soon became acquainted with and introduced to her partnert in wedgies Jazmin. The girls turn and see...

155.content:
Branching out of high school:

#1: Cait: Cait is a young woman with a paler complexion and long hair colored a soft red. She wears large thin-framed circular glasses which perfectly showcase her blue eyes, as well as show off her other beautiful and smooth facial features, including her soft chin and curved nose. Cait was quite the nerd in high school, in fact, bullied in the very same high school the previous girls attend! But adulthood had (so far) been kinder to her; she had grown into a beautiful woman with ample breasts, a stunning figure and a very shapely round bottom on top of her nicely thick legs. She works as a barista at the local coffee shop, and thus has a fair bit of interaction with the high schoolers. Although most of her former classmates had forgotten about their wedgie-filled high school days, Cait still remembers them vividly, and sometimes feels the desire to hide when she sees a cheer uniform.

#2: Abby: Abby is a recent high school graduate, and Cait's roommate. She has long golden blonde hair which curls ever so slightly, framing her round, friendly face. Her body isn't quite as curvy as her roommate's, but she makes up for it with her more sizable bust, bigger bottom, and thicker legs. She was quite popular in school, but never quite the same as her other popular friends; she was never found hanging girls up by their panties or giving swirlies in the locker room, but rather in the middle ground, not being wedgied nor giving any. This was due to the fact that she was terrified she would somehow mess up and end up being wedgied; to get wedgied is a long-held fear of Abby's and she constantly worries about the day it might happen, although it just might be even sooner than she thinks!

1551.content:
"Oh gosh," Cait muttered to herself, slightly picking up her pace. Her apartment wasn't far from her workplace, so she opted to walk, which she was typically fine with, as it allowed her to enjoy some time outside before working in the cafe all day. Today, however, was a bit of a different story.

Near the end of her shift, a girl had walked in wearing the local high school's cheer uniform. Despite this girl's small stature and altogether cute physique, Cait had a deep nervousness stemming from her. She managed to keep herself together as she took the cheerer's order, however.

"Salim? That's a pretty name." She smiled, for some reason trying to get on the young girl's good side. "Thanks!" Salim beamed with a smile that was too intent for Cait's comfort. Regardless, the rest of the exchange went smoothly and Cait soon made the drink and handed it out, assuming that would be the end of it all, as it usually was. Unfortunately for her, Salim had noticed something about Cait when she first walked in. Cait was sweeping the lobby and bent over to pick something up; as she did, her yellow panties with white frills on the waistband rose up over the waistband of her tight jeans. A big target for a cheerleader such as herself.

So Salim sat down at a table for a while on her phone. It just so happened that Cait's shift ended just 15 minutes after Salim had walked in. Salim watched with a smile as she saw Cait taking her apron off and heading into the back room, then emerging just a couple minutes later without her apron, her panties still exposed to the watchful eyes of Salim. If Cait wasn't making it a point to not look, she would have noticed Salim get up behind her.


As soon as Cait got out of the cafe and into the fresh air, she began to relax. Her home was only a 15 minute walk, 20 if Cait took the route away from the street towards a grassier woods area. Cait often chose the latter on her walks home, as the silence of the woods relaxed her much more than the sound of cars buzzing past.

Unfortunately for Cait, she also happened to choose the long route today, which means that's the route Salim followed her on. As soon as they got away from the public eye, Cait froze, not daring to turn around as she felt the dread and the all-too familiar sensation of fingers wrapped around her panties.

"You know, when I first saw you, I THOUGHT you looked like a nerd! Then I saw these panties sticking out, and I just knew." Salim giggled from behind Cait, who had wide eyes and was paralyzed by fear. "Please, I don't know what you want, but," "But what?" Salim giggled, giving the smallest tug upwards, Cait wincing as she did. "But I'll do anything!" "Do anything for what?" Salim replied, tightening her grip. "Anything to avoid a wedgie!"

Salim laughed, "Wow! Already showing your true dorky colors, huh? Unfortunately for you, this wedgie is definitely happening." Without another word, Salim gripped tighter and yanked upwards, the bright colored panties shooting out of Cait's tight jeans. Even with her smaller size, Salim gave Cait one of the strongest wedgies she'd ever been given!

"Oh my gosh!" Cait groaned, then thought to herself, "bullies have been getting better at giving wedgies?" Unfortunately for her, the question in her head was met with another strong tug getting her onto her tip-toes. "How's the wedgie, dork?" "Worse than I expected," Cait replied in a strained tone, struggling to keep her shoes touching the ground. "I bet! And it only gets worse from here!" Salim snickered, letting Cait's panties snap down, still stretched out over her jeans.

Confused, Cait stood still with her panties more exposed than ever, not sure how to react, but definitely not wanting to turn around. "She said it would get worse, but then she let go?" Cait thought to herself, not wanting to ask aloud and risk the wrath of the tiny cheerleader. But then her question was answered, "Take your belt off." Cait hesitated, which earned her a swift spank over the seat of her jeans from Salim. "Ouchie! Okay..." She grumbled, undoing her leather belt and holding it in her hands, her jeans more than tight enough to stay up on their own.

As Cait held her belt in her hands, she thought to herself: "This is ridiculous! I'm an adult now! I do not need to be getting wedgied and bossed around by cheerleaders anymore! She's just a high schooler! And look how tiny she is! I've had enough." Cait turned around with her belt in her hands and a rush of confidence. Looking down at the cheerleader, she declared, "Listen, this has gone far enough! You're just a high schooler, and I'm an adult. You won't be giving me any more wedgies, understand?" Salim's mouth curled into a smirk as she crossed her arms and looked up at Cait. "What are you gonna do about it, dork?"

Cait blushed, but pushed on: "I think I should call your parents and tell them that you're out wedgieing people!" This threat had the opposite of the intended effect on Salim, who began to laugh loudly, "Oh, so you're gonna call my parents and identify yourself as a grown woman getting wedgied by a high schooler?" Cait just blushed. "I-I didn't think of it that way," she replied, her tone slightly softer as she felt her dominance slipping away.

"It's like I say, 'Once a nerd, always a nerd.' And you are definitely a nerd." Salim smiled. As Cait tried to think of a reply, she gasped as she felt the belt whipped out of her hands. "Now for that little outburst, you're really gonna get it." Cait stood up straight and raised a pointed finger to Salim, "Now listen up, little girl! I'm not going to 'get' anything, because this is all over, got it?"

"Ow-how-how-howiiiiie!" Cait cried, her head hung in shame as she looked at the ground zooming in and out as she was bounced repeatedly. "I'm sorry!" She whined as Salim bounced her by her stretchy yellow panties, each tug a new, harsher wedgie than before as Cait's tip-toes barely touched the ground before bouncing back up away from it. "Say it again!" Salm ordered with a smile as she bounced the embarrassed woman.

"I'm a dork and I always will be!" "Louder!" "I'm a dork and I always will be!" "One more time!" "I am a dork, and I always will be!" Cait cried out, much louder than she would've liked, her cheeks burning a bright red. Salim bounced her back to the ground and let her gather herself before continuing. "Now that should stop any more outbursts from you, nerd girl." The cheerleader giggled as Cait stood up straight. Then, Salim picked up the belt which she had put on the ground and got to one knee in the grass. "Okay, over here." Salim said casually, patting her leg.

Cait left her mouth open in shock as she realized what Salim was saying, but realized that any more defiance would lead to another bouncing wedgie, or worse. And so she got over the high schooler's knee, hanging her head in shame.

Cait couldn't tell what was worse: the sting of the belt whipping her bottom, or the embarrassment of the belt whipping her bottom. Either way, soon enough into her spanking, she couldn't keep quiet. "Owie! Ouch! Ooh! Owww! OW! Ouchie! Ow! Ohohoooo ow! Please Salim, stop spanking me!" She whined pathetically. "I'm gonna spank you until I'm done! Got it, loser?" Salim emphasized her point with a hard swat. "Ouchie! Yes..." Cait groaned, her legs kicking as the belt thwapped against her round bottom over and over again.

Nearly twenty minutes later Salim stood the teary-eyed Cait up and laughed, "Wow, crying from your spanking, huh? Real tough girl." Salim patted Cait's butt softly before one last hard smack with her hand, then continued. "Okay nerd, this is a ton of fun, but I do need to be going soon. Don't worry, we'll see each other again. Now, hand over your phone and wallet."

"What?!" Cait asked in surprise, "Okay, bullying me is one thing, but this is illegal! You're mugging me?" "Settle down, I'll give them back, I'm not mugging you, I promise. Now hurry up, or I'll put you over my knee again." Salim's reassurance, along the threat of another spanking, was enough to spark Cait into action, handing over her phone and wallet to Salim.

Salim fiddled with the phone for a few minutes before handing it back with a smile, "There you go! I'm in your contacts now as 'My Bully'. I'll do some more tinkering with that later on when I have time, okay?" Cait just groaned as she put her phone back into her pocket, "Ah-ah-ah! You'll want to keep that in your hands."

Salim then turned to Cait's wallet, from which she took out some cash, Cait estimated about twenty dollars. "Hey! That's-" Salim put her hand up before closing the wallet, "Just consider it your lunch money, okay loser?" Before tucking the money into the waistband of her skirt and handing the wallet back. "And finally, your keys. You'll want them in your hand, just trust me." Cait, confused, took out her keys. "Now turn around. Hands on your head. Good nerd!"

Cait blushed as she followed the young girl's order, then gasped as she felt another wedgie, her panties once more stretching out as they shot up her bottom, the light yellow fabric stretching out across her back as Salim tugged over and over, each tug slightly lifting Cait's hips up. "Now grab on." Cait whimpered as she grabbed at the legholes of her own panties, thinking to herself how Salim easily could've given her an atomic wedgie if she so desired.

But it wasn't over; Cait felt her belt wrapped around her wrists and then tied! Salim had locked her into a wedgie with her hands up behind her head! Before she could protest, it got worse; she felt the cool breeze of air on her bare legs. Cait stood there, holding her wedgie in place, now spanked, almost atomic wedgied, and pansted. "Okay, see you tomorrow!" Salim said cheerily before turning and walking away.

"Salim! Salim! You can't leave me to walk home like this! Please! Come undo my wedgie! Salim!" Cait cried out, but it was helpless. Salim was gone, and so Cait was left helpless in her wedgie, doomed to walk home, pantsed, wedgied, and spanked.

What happens next?

15513.content:
"Okay Cait, just think. This is easy, you've gotten out of plenty of wedgies before. This isn't the first time a snarky cheerleader has left you in a... VERY big wedgie." She groaned to herself, talking out loud as she struggled, shuffling her feet, moving in small circles as she tried to wriggle her way out of the humiliating predicament. "And it probably won't be the last, either." She sighed, taking a break.

As she started up her writhing again, her foot caught a rock in the grass, causing her to fall over, face-first, into the mud, only her elbows keeping her face from plunging straight down towards the muck. "Well that's... lucky." Cait whined, staring inches from her muddy doom. Now a new challenge faced her: standing up. In the position her hands was in, this was already difficult, let alone her wedgie and pants at her ankles! Cait resolved herself to her fate and began struggling, curling her body to try to get some traction and stand up.

She struggled for a bit before managing to find a patch of less muddy grass, rolling over and sitting up. Unfortunately, in the process, she realized that her feet had lost hold of her jeans, which were now laying in the mud she had just gotten away from, leaving her in just her striped shirt and her panties. "Just great! First I get a new bully, then I lose my pants! What else could go wrong today?" Cait groaned as she managed to stand up, finally on her feet again.

But in the distance, there was some good news! Cait heard the dull sound of a marching band; there was a soccer game tonight at the high school, which meant the popular girls, and thus bullies, would be at the game, rather than out in the woods, where Cait was currently stood, mortified.

At least, that's what Cait thought. But the blood in her veins froze as she heard two young female voices. With her hands up next to her ears, she couldn't quite tell where they were coming from, and looked around hurriedly to try and figure it out before she got herself seen. Deciding to play it safe, she simply dashed to the treeline and wait until they passed. Cait watched with bated breath as the two young girls walked down the path, then gasped as she realized not only were her pants on the ground near the path, but also her phone, wallet, and keys!

The two girls walked by chatting, suddenly slowing down as they noticed the belongings on the ground. "Hey Alex, check it out! Some nerd lost their pants!" One of them giggled. It was a girl in dark clothing with her hair dyed green who picked up Cait's jeans, showing them off to a girl Cait knew was trouble; blonde hair, tight khaki pants, and a Ralph-Lauren polo. "Wow! That's a step above pantsing! We should use it on the nerds at school tomorrow!" Alex laughed. "Wait... look, Hunter! There's stuff on the ground! Oh my God, the nerd even lost their phone! Pick it up!"

"Too afraid to get your precious nails dirty?" The goth girl, Hunter, spat before picking Cait's phone up. "Wow, not even locked? Confident for someone dorky enough to get pantsed in the woods." She commented as she opened Cait's phone up. Cait bit her lip as she watched from the distance as the two girls giggled and discussed what to do with the belongings they had found.

Cait looked on in horror, unsure of what to do. These girls were much younger than her, and Cait had been humiliated in front enough young girls today. But she needed her things, and if they took them, she couldn't just let them go! On the other hand, she was not in a position to be making any demands, quite literally. Then, a third burden plagued Cait's mind; a pang in her bladder alerted her to the fact that she hadn't used the bathroom in at least 8 hours, since the start of her shift and being tormented by Salim. Now she had to throw in the worry of wetting herself in front of these two girls!

"What? She has a contact that just says 'My Bully'! Dude, this loser is a goldmine for humiliation!" Cait grimaced, realizing that her first day being bullied again, and she was already the pinnacle of loser-dom. "If we can find out whoever this loser is, we might have a top dork to show off!" Alex smiled, going through the phone now that Hunter had picked it up.

"Looks like her name is Cait, and... Oh my God, Hunter! She isn't a kid, she's an adult! I cannot wait to meet the loser who gets pantsed when they're out of school! Let's look at her Instagram posts... Wow, she doesn't even look like a nerd!" "What? Look at those glasses! Total nerd stuff!" "Just because someone wears glasses doesn't make them a nerd, idiot."

The discussions devolved into bickering in which multiple times Cait felt humiliation just from what she was overhearing. "But let's agree on one thing, this cutie is one massive loser," Hunter smiled, to which Alex replied with a nod. "Definitely. And we need to find her. The Queens could use an older subject." "Like that one high school dork from a couple weeks ago?" "Ha! Exactly like her! Unfortunately, I doubt Cait here has quite the same massive bubble butt as that math loser did." "I don't think anyone has the same bubble butt. But dorks always seem to have some jiggle to their asses." Hunter laughed before shifting tone, "Well, I gotta get home soon. The soccer game's going on, so there might be a lot of competition out tonight and we can't risk losing our crowns. Besides, we just hit the jackpot." Alex nodded, "Yeah, my curfew's soon too. Let's get going." And the two headed down the path.

"Queens? What is going on today?" Cait whined under her breath, her arms aching from being in the same position, holding her wedgie aloft, for so long. "And what kind of high schooler has such an early curfew?" She wondered for a moment before realizing there was more important things to worry about at the moment. "Come on, come on, what do I do?" She groaned, crossing her legs to attempt and alleviate the pressure in her bladder, to little success.

155131.content:
Cait decided to bite the bullet as the two girls began to leave, walking out from the treeline and into the open clearing. "Hey! You two!" She called out in as authoritative a voice as possible. It seemed to work, at first, the two girls in front of her turning, their faces seemingly afraid. They were even younger than Cait had originally thought. For a moment, she thought maybe that would be to her advantage! Oh how wrong she was.

Once the shock of the moment was gone, the girls erupted into laughter, looking between each other and the pathetic woman before them. "Okay, okay, I know, ha ha, it's very funny. This is just a prank my friend pulled on me that's gone too far. Now, will you come undo this belt?" She said, trying to maintain her composure. Unfortunately for Cait, the two girls weren't having any of it. "Your friend, huh? Would this friend happen to be named 'My Bully'?" Alex giggled, waving Cait's phone at her, causing the woman to deflate slightly. They know too much for Cait to lie to them.

"Okay, you got me. I... got wedgied by my bully. And I need help getting out. Could you please?" Cait asked, trying as hard as she could to sound the least amount of pathetic she could in such a scenario, though her pale complexion was selling her out as her cheeks burned a bright red. But her efforts were very clearly in vain as Alex replied, "Mmm, no, I don't think so. We have some question for your first. So, first of all, what kind of adult has a bully? I didn't know adults bullied each other. Seems kind of embarrassing to be an adult but to have a bully, don't you think, Hunter?" "Absolutely humiliating, Alex. Couldn't agree more."

Cait also couldn't agree more, as her faced shined beet red. "Well, some adults do have bullies, okay? I happen to have one." Alex giggled, "Okay, so how often does your bully give you wedgies like this?" Cait shuffled her feet, "Not very often. It's not like I'm in high school again, seeing her every other class period." Cait explained, knowing all too well how bullying worked out in such a scenario. "Okay, so, run it back down for us, from the top, will you, Cait? Dork? I think dork sounds better. Spell it all out for us, dork." Hunter smirked, crossing her arms.

Cait huffed, but knew she wouldn't get anywhere by refusing. "My bully took me out here, gave me a wedgie, and took my pants off before leaving. It's not that complicated," Cait groaned, trying to skim over as many details as possible. "No, not complicated, just hilarious!" Alex replied, holding her stomach. "For us. Probably really embarrassing for you!" Hunter added on with a wide smile. "You don't know the half of it," Cait nodded. "Now, please, would you help me out?" "Oh, we have a long long way to go before we help you, loser." Cait simply sighed.

"So, why do you have a bully in the first place? Can't stand up for yourself?" Alex smiled. "I- well, I don't think that's exactly-" "Probably because she's obviously a nerd! Look at those panties!" Hunter interrupted, circling Cait before gasping. "Oh my god! Alex! She's been spanked, too!" Cait closed her eyes and sighed as she felt a hand slap her freshly-tenderized bottom. "Ouch..." she grumbled under her breath. "Man, what else did this mystery bully do to you that you're skipping over?" "Nothing! She just gave me this wedgie and spanked me, nothing crazy..." Cait replied, averting her gaze. If her experience in this field had taught her something, it was that it really wasn't all that crazy of a bully encounter. She might even consider it a good one, if it weren't the first she'd had in years.

"So, to be clear," Alex began, her spoiled brat smile searing into Cait's mind, "You are a grown woman, who has not only been pantsed, wedgied, and spanked! But you also have a bully, and now you're asking - some might say begging - us for help to get you out of said wedgie, which said bully put you in. All that sound correct?" Cait hesitated for a moment before softly saying, "Yes, that's right." "So, now tell me, in your own words, why all this happened."

Cait breathed deeply, her eyes darting between her current captors and the ground. "I guess because... she's a bully, and she knows a target when she sees one? She wanted to give me a wedgie, and so she did. She wanted to spank me, and so she did. She wanted to pants me, so she did." Cait said, each sentence further entombing her into nerd-dom, just like her high school days when she would be cornered by the popular girls.

There was a brief pause after Cait finished speaking before the two young girls yet again erupted in laughter, doubling over as Cait fully admitted her own pathetic situation, all while still in the wedgie she spoke of. "Wow, that's incredible." Hunter smiled, wiping tears from her eyes. "I have never seen, or even heard of! A grown woman getting wedgied... but you! You are a true dork. I would say you should be proud, but it's honestly pretty embarrassing for you!" Alex laughed. Cait merely shuffled in place, the teasing only giving her time to think about one thing: her bladder was still as full as before.

"Okay, well I told you everything you asked me. Will you help me now?" Alex and Hunter looked between each other before Hunter spoke up. "Well, we would. But, we had an encounter a few weeks ago, and we learned from it. Now we don't let nerds go so easy. So," Alex took out her phone and promptly snapped a few pictures of Cait in her wedgie, the surprise of the situation leaving Cait's mouth agape and her cheeks blushing in the photos. "We're going to put ourselves in your contact list, okay? I'm Queen Alex, this is Queen Hunter, and you will address us as such. Got it?" Cait merely nodded in response, until Hunter prodded her with a stinging spank, "She asked if you got it!" Cait jumped and nodded faster, "I got it, Queen Alex!" Her response eliciting more laughter.

"Very good! Now, we have your Instagram account and these pictures, and we're going to upload them and tag you in them if you don't comply with whatever we call or text you with. Got it?" "Yes, Queen Alex." Alex took a moment to look at Hunter, "Wow, this loser is way easier than that bubble-butted math dork from before! She actually just does whatever we say!" Cait felt as if she shrunk while she was talked about.

"Good. Now, last thing before we help you out, we have a sort of... initiation of new nerds we welcome into our kingdom. Hunter and I are each gonna have our turns spanking you, 100 spanks each. After each one, you're going to count and say, 'The Queens of Ashbruy Middle School own my ass', got it?"

Cait felt the world slow down around her and come to halt. "She said... Ashbury... MIDDLE SCHOOL?" Cait exclaimed in her mind, her expression completely blank as her pale cheeks quickly filled in more and more red. "You... you're in middle school?" Cait eeked out. Alex nodded casually, as if it was obvious. "Yup! Best bullies in the whole middle school, soon to be high school!" She said proudly.

"Nonono, this can't be happening! I can't be bullied by middle schoolers!" Cait exclaimed. If her hands weren't already tied up next to her head, they would be running through her hair. "Oh, it's happening, princess." Hunter smirked. "No! Not middle schoolers! I'm a grown woman! I cannot be bullied by middle schoolers!" Cait cried out, looking between the two girls, who were obviously now far too young to be Salim's age. "News flash, dork." Alex smiled.

"100! The Queens of Ashbury Middle School own my ass!" Cait cried out into the forest as Alex delivered the final, rather painful, spank to Cait's sore round bottom. "Okay Hunter, she's all warmed up! Your turn." Cait groaned as she was handed over to the OTHER middle schooler before being bent over again, the process starting up once more. "1! The Queens of Ashbury Middle School own my ass!" Cait said loud and clear, not wanting to start over like she had to with Alex.

Soon enough, her initiation was over and she was stood up. "Now finally, before we really let you go, just a couple more questions so you know your place." "As if she didn't already," Hunter added in with a smile. "Who gets wedgies?" Cait paused for a moment before replying, "Uhm. Nerds?" "And who has a wedgie right now?" "I-... I do." "What does that make you?" "A nerd... Queen Alex." "And don't you forget it! And who gave you that wedgie?" "My bully did." "And why do you have a bully?" "Because... I'm a nerd!" "Very good! You're acing this quiz! Just what we'd expect from a dork. Last question: why did your bully give you that wedgie?" "Because... because she knew I'm a nerd, and that she could wedgie me, and pants me, and humiliate me. She knew she could be my bully because she wanted to." Cait blurted out. She had admittedly thought about this whole system quite a bit, and so these answers, while absolutely humiliating, were something she had known for quite a while.

"Very good. All right, Hunter. Queens are always good on their word." With that, the two girls helped Cait out of her wedgie and gave her jeans back. In fact, they 'helped' Cait put them on by grabbing the back belt loop and yanking up as hard as they could, ensuring the seam of the jeans was firmly wedgied between Cait's round cheeks, the frilly yellow panties still sticking out of them as before. "No wonder you get bullied. Look at these panties sticking over the edge of your pants!" Alex laughed as Cait started to walk away. Cait soon found herself unable to move forward as Alex's hand firmly gripped the waistband, yanking it upwards and back out of the jeans, giving Cait a fierce wedgie that nearly dragged her backwards. "Owwwiie!" Cait cried, her hands shooting between her legs as Alex tugged higher and higher on her wedgie. "Man, that first wedgie on a fresh nerd always feels great. Try it out, Hunter!" "With pleasure."

Alex and Hunter shared a few more wedgies with Cait before finally allowing her a reprieve, albeit making sure she didn't pick the wedgie, and that the panties stayed firmly wedged between her cheeks along with her jeans.

info.brief_description: A woman finds herself wedgied and humiliated by the people in her life.
info.description:
This interactive is the story of a woman that in some way or another ends up humiliated and wedgied by/in front of everyone else in her life. Simply choose a girl and begin! The girl can like or dislike the wedgies/humiliation, up to you!

The only two rules:

No males

Be creative!

Otherwise just have fun with it!
